summary: This bill, H.R. 622, amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to increase funding for the Conservation Stewardship Program. Specifically, it allocates $1.8 billion annually from 2025 through 2031. It also transfers $5,020,000,000 from the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 to the Secretary of Agriculture to support the program, using the Commodity Credit Corporation's resources.
